item.title: Onboarding Bitcoin and Lightning Developers
item.description: Onboarding Bitcoin and Lightning Developers Speaker 0: 00:00:15 Okay, so the next talk is going to be onboarding Bitcoin and Lightning developers with Will Clark, Gloria Zhao. This is Josie, Bitcoin Core contributor. Jonas, Nick. Please come to the stage. Speaker 1: 00:00:32 One mic short. Hey, guys. How are you doing? Welcome. So we are going to be talking about that onboarding Bitcoin and Lightning developers. Do you guys want to introduce yourself?
